IS用霰弹枪爆头伊拉克士兵 by Acneska This is an excerpt from ISIS video from Wilayat Diyala, Iraq titled “The Land of Epic Battles 2“. The whole video is a bunch or war footage peppered with IED footage and a couple of flash-backs to past executions. Instead of boring you with the whole 16 minutes of propaganda, here’s the most interesting part … Continue reading "Iraqi Soldier Executed by ISIS with Shotgun" 《Iraqi Soldier Executed by ISIS with Shotgun》源地址 http://ift.tt/2b6LuR4
